response.overview: Following in the footsteps of Linklater's Slacker and Smith's Clerks, Longview is a movie about "nothing." It offers a funny, realistic, dialogue-driven glimpse into the lives of these two art students, and we see how they have changed in a 24 hour period. Whether they're falling in or out of love, losing a friend or making one, or simple becoming better artists, main characters Mike and Spencer will learn that a day can change everything.
response.title: Longview
